snippet.title: Hypnagogia 催眠術 Official Trailer - LSD: Dream Emulator Inspired Game
snippet.description:
[Free Download Link] https://sodaraptor.itch.io/hypnagogia
[Music Credit] "Concrete" by Rakshal - https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/969715

Enter dreamlike worlds of pure, realized surrealism.

Hypnagogia 催眠術 is an independently developed game influenced by the cult classic PSX game LSD Dream-Emulator. Inspired by real dreams, players will experience the comforting aura of cat-inhabited temples, find treasure in a fantastical hedge-maze with strange creatures, get lost in a dilapidated city full of hopeless denizens, and much more. With a total of 9 creative worlds to explore, there's lots to do and lots to see. 

When dreams turn to nightmares, will you overcome the challenge of returning to reality?
